name: Héctor López
bio: Héctor López, hailing from the vibrant streets of Mérida, is known for his electrifying left foot that dazzles defenders. With a fierce competitive spirit and unmatched agility, he leaves his mark on every match, embodying the heart and soul of Yucatán Force. His signature move, a swift cut inside followed by a curling shot, is a crowd favorite, making him a true local hero and a constant threat on the flank.
